all_answers.question: Household energy usage gizmo
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: The Household Energy Usage Gizmo™ allows students to make estimates for how long each item is used on a daily basis to get an estimate for the total power consumed during a day, a week, a month, and a year.  It is to explore the energy used by many household appliances
